Reviews.Title: Unable to get this working
Reviews.Author: Maxwell's House "N M"
Reviews.Content: I am pretty tech savvy yet I was unable to get this working. This may be because I have a Mac. There is only software to easily set up for PC.

Reviews.Title: NO WiFi range to speak of
Reviews.Author: David Wike
Reviews.Content: Camera seemed to work well within ten feet of WiFi.  Could not go into another room and find it.  WiFi range seemed very limited

ProductInfo.Features:
This IP camera is widely used in baby/pet care, warehouse monitoring, traffic monitoring and many other scenarios.
With the help of this IP camera, you can access monitoring data anytime, anywhere!
You can communicate with the people monitoring with the built-in Two-Way Audio system, live!
You can access live video with a computer or smart phone once you can access the internet.
It supports most popular browsers like IE (or any browsers with IE core)/Firefox/Opera; also does it support smart phones like iPhone or phones with Android system other PDA.
ProductInfo.Name: Tenvis Mini319W Wireless WiFi IP Camera CMOS CCTV Security System Black Color
